Articles.Content:
so i found out a bit too late about rbtown, and aparently the project is dead , my question is:

is it possible to use it on 023.5? i want to be able to spawn my own stuff, because in my game style i like to pretend i am "conquering" every zone i put a flag on, so i would like to know if i can use it for that end.

also i know you guys are probably wondering why i just dont go and test it myself, i am not at home right now xD i ill only get home late tomorow
Is it possible? Sure, read the last 10 pages of the thread. It's been updated for a while.
thanks. can't wait to play with it xD
